result.title: Mixed signal IC designer
result.description:
As a member of the mixed signal team, the candidate will work with senior circuit designers in the design, validation and characterization of mixed signal and analog IP blocks for SOC. The IPs include PLL, DLL, SERDES, high speed IO and data converters, etc. for sub-14nm technologies. The candidate will have exposure to a broad range of circuit and technologies.  In addition, the candidate will work with engineers of various disciplines in the development and enhancement of analog/digital design methodology.

Qualifications:

Strong fundamental in analog integrated circuit design
Good knowledge of digital logic design, including Verilog coding
Excellent communication skills
Lab skill is a plus
Knowledge on signal integrity is a plus
MS or PH.D. in electrical engineering
